title: Amber Darling
alternative_title: 琥珀の貴方 ; Kohaku no anata
status: 琥珀の貴方 ; Kohaku no anata
description:
Description :
        A collection of yuri short stories by Mikawa Miso. The stories largely focus on adults and feature intense emotions.  These stories deal with how complex relationships can be by looking at relationships on the edge of becoming something else, something more, or unwinding entirely.
